strings.name: Save The Pond
strings.desc-10: Edward wants you to defeat a bunch of Magikarp.
strings.desc-X: You reset your quests, but fucked up the quests
strings.start: Would you like to reset your quests?
strings.startNo: No, I fucked up by talking to you.
strings.stage-10-0: Just here to let you know that this is dicked
